import React from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGlobalContext } from "../../context/context"; const CreateProfile = () => { const history = useHistory(); const { createOrUpdateProfile } = useGlobalContext(); const initialState = { company: "", website: "", location: "", status: "", skills: "", githubusername: "", bio: "", twitter: "", facebook: "", linkedin: "", youtube: "", instagram: "", }; const [formData, setFormData] = React.useState(initialState); const [socialyes, setsocialyes] = React.useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, instagram, youtube, } = formData; const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); createOrUpdateProfile(formData, history); }; const onChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return ( <>

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{socialyes && ( <>
)} Go Back
); }; export default CreateProfile;
